thread.title: AG: Rule hits gun show attendance | Port Charlotte News | yoursun.com
thread.title_full: AG: Rule hits gun show attendance | Port Charlotte News | yoursun.com

author: Jim Saunders News Service of Florida
title: AG: Rule hits gun show attendance | Port Charlotte News | yoursun.com
text: TALLAHASSEE — Florida this week revamped a lawsuit that challenges a new federal rule requiring more gun sellers to be licensed and run background checks on buyers, in part pointing to lower attendance at gun shows. Lawyers for the state raised the gun-show issue because they said the rule is reducing tax revenue from purchases of admission tickets. kAmq:56? 25>:?:DEC2E:@? 2EE@C?6JD =2DE >@?E9 2C8F65 E92E 2? :?:E:2= G6CD:@? @7 E96 =2HDF:E D9@F=5 36 5:D>:DD65 3642FD6 E96 DE2E6 925 ?@E D9@H? =682= DE2?5:?8 — 2? :DDF6 E92E =@DE E2I C6G6?F6 4@F=5 255C6DD]k^Am kAm%96 C6G:D65 =2HDF:E[ 7:=65 :? 7656C2= 4@FCE :? %2>A2[ D2:5 E96 DE2E6’D “2DD6CE65 :?;FCJ — =@DE E2I C6G6?F6 — :D 4=62C 2?5 @?8@:?8]”k^Am kAm“~C5:?2C:=J[ 8F?
